text: Aap kahiye kay iss per bhi wohi qadir hai kay tum per koi azab tumharay upper say bhej dey ya tumharay paon talay say ya kay tum ko giroh giroh ker kay sab ko bhira dey aur tumharay aik doosray ki laraee chakha dey. Aap dekhiye to sahi hum kiss tarah dalaeel mukhtalif pehlooâ€™on say biyan kertay hain shayad woh samajh jayen
